title: Preparation and Updating Procedure Of The Academic Calendar | Yönerge
text: Procedure No PSR-C270-0101-V04 Effective Date 28-12-2004 Update Date 21-12-2023 Related Unit / Owner SR / Öğrenci Kaynakları Direktörü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Related Instruction Directive On The Preparation and Updating Of The Academic Calendar Aim The purpose of publishing this procedure is to explain the implementation steps regarding the preparation of the Sabancı University Academic Calendar Scope This procedure covers Sabancı University students, academic members and staff. Definitions / Abbreviations Academic Council: The council, consisting of the President, Vice Presidents, Faculty Deans and Academic Members, is authorized to make decisions on academic matters SL: School of Languages Institute: Graduate School of Engineering and Natural Sciences, Graduate School of Social Sciences, Sabancı Graduate Business School Faculty: Faculty of Engineering and Natural Sciences, Faculty of Art and Social Sciences, Sabancı Business School SR: Student Resources Unit SU: Sabancı University UEC: University Education Committee YOK: Presidency of the Higher Education Council Application Steps: Responsibility Outputs / Timing 1. Preparation and Announcement of the Academic Calendar 1.1. The SR prepares the draft academic calendar for the next academic year, according to the approximate timings specified for the subjects and periods to be included in the academic calendar in the Academic Calendar Preparation and Update Directive (ISR-C270-01) , in accordance with the Academic Calendar Preparation Instruction (FSR-C27001- 02) and submits it to the opinion and approval of the SR Director. SR Preparation of Academic Calendar Draft / 1 st week of February 1.2. The Director of SR reviews the academic calendar draft and makes suggestions and comments regarding the calendar. Director of SR Review of the Academic Calendar Draft / 2 nd week of February 1.3. The SR sends the academic calendar draft to Faculties/Institutes/SL and all relevant units of the University to receive opinions and suggestions regarding the determined dates.. SR Sharing the Academic Calendar Draft with Faculties/Institutes/SL and Related Units / 4 th week of February 1.4. The Faculties/Institutes/SL and relevant units convey their suggestions and opinions on the academic calendar draft to the SR. Faculties/Institutes/SL and Related Units Submission of the Suggestions and Opinions on the Academic Calendar Draft / 1 st week of March 1.5. The SR evaluates the suggestions, updates the academic calendar and takes the opinions of the Vice President responsible for Education and submits them to the UEC. Following the UEC opinions, the final draft calendar is submitted by the SR to the Academic Board for opinion and approval. SR Submission of the Academic Calendar for Approval / Within May at the latest 1.6. The SR updates the academic calendar, by taking into account the recommendations of the Academic Council (if any), and announces the approved academic calendar on the Academic Calendar page on the internal and external web. SR Announcement of the Academic Calendar / 4 th week of May 2. Updating the Academic Calendar 2.1. The SR examines the suggestions for changes to the academic calendar that may come from Faculties/Institutes/SL or an administrative unit for a justified and valid reason and submits them to the Academic Council for approval. SR Submission of the Changes to be Made in the Academic Calendar to the Approval of the Academic Board / In Necessary Situations 2.2. The Academic Council may "approve" or "reject" proposed changes to the academic calendar. The changes approved by the Academic Council are published on SU internal and external websites.
